materials.raw_text: Cd: 10 g, Cu: 5 g, Er: 15 g, Ni: 15 g, Tb: 5 g

sourcing.instructions: Cd: Chemical supply stores, Cu: Metal suppliers, Er: Rare earth material distributors, Ni: Metal suppliers, Tb: Rare earth material distributors
